form.description: Required inputs: FASTQs, STAR Index, and GTF file.

star_index.title: STAR Index

gtf.title: GTF File

fasta.description: Select the FASTA file to use for reference.

protocol.title: Protocol
protocol.description: The protocol that was used to generate the single cell data, e.g. 10x Genomics v2 Chemistry.

star_feature.title: STAR Feature
